comment.body: I know that feeling. I reckon its because your serotonin levels drop at night.

I hear what you're saying. It's much easier to be happy if you are ignorant or dumb - you are neither and that's a weight as well as a gift. But its important to remember that there's no point in giving up as well! If all we are able to do is survive then we might as well, right? You're a coder - analyse your life and try to itemize what's wrong with it. Allow yourself to fail, and then try and fix things one by one. I guess that's all the advice I have :)

I use the following:
 - Mopidy (a python-based music player which is wire-compatible with MPD)
 - Beets (a python-based music organisation and tagging system)
 - Mopidy's spotify plugins (one for playing, one for browsing).
 - ncmpcpp
